sentences.sContent: Greater levels of stress may seriously handicap some students.
sentences.sCn: 更高程度的压力可能会将一些学生置于不利地位。

synos.tran: 障碍；不利条件，不利的因素

remMethod.val: handi(手) + cap(帽子) → 手上套了一个帽子， 就形成了障碍 → 障碍

words.tran: 裁判人员；（赛马时）决定优劣条件之人

trans.tranOther: If an event or a situation handicaps someone or something, it places them at a disadvantage
if someone has a handicap, a part of their body or their mind has been permanently injured or damaged. Many people think that this word is offensive.
